name: STATEMENT_SET
documentation: A container for a specific set of statements intended to be used together.

statement.name: statement
statement.documentation: The member statements of this statement set.

name.name: name
name.documentation: Optional name of this rule set.

execution_result.name: execution_result
execution_result.documentation: Execution result of the whole rule set. Determined by the and-ing of result values of Assertions in the rule set.
